idea:
We specialize in UX/UI Design, Product Design, Digital Experiences, Digital marketing and promotions, app design, web design, e-commerce and all other end to end innovative solution provider. We are a creative group of people who design influential digital experiences to create real business value.
name: TECHBYDESIGN SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Fintech.bot is a unique e2e (Electronic to Electronic) solution pioneered by Botmatic Solution (p) Ltd, an India based entity, emerging in the Robotics & Automation world with services exclusively designed for BFSI, IT & ITES sectors including specific ingredients for finance transformation projects of any organisation to achieve their ROIs on automation initiatives. Fintech.bot is a solution provider for all kinds of finance & accounts Automation/ Robotic initiatives.
We have developed pioneering solutions for any finance/accounts processes and provide strategic solutions to achieve the ROIs. We believe in partnership with organization’s digital strategy and in being a solution provider in a continuous manner.
Botmatic team uses Fintech.bot solutions for all kind of non standard Finance/account processes and strongly believes “Accountants to be a value promoter than a data processor”. Let all non value added jobs be taken care by our automation processes so that accountants can invest their time to maximise the wealth of their corporations.
We strongly believe: “laying strategic foundation of a “Mother bot” in any finance organisation, which works as an enabler for finance transformation projects & achieve process excellence & efficiency in real term”. 

We also taking our existing expertise of finance expertise to provide the sales and marketing strategy through CRM like Sales-force  
Our main pillar of platform, Product & services: FinTech |Integration | Analytics | Automation
name: BOTMATIC SOLUTION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
PrimaEscapes is a boutique holiday villa rental service.


We believe that every home tells a unique story that adds to a traveler’s experience. We handpick and curate homes for an enhanced holiday experience. Set in un-touched and tranquil locales, our lavish stays bring with them the warmth and comfort of a home, while maintaining the standards and service of a boutique hotel.


With care taking staff managing each home and Concierge services throughout your stay, your vacation will always be an enriching experience.
name: PrimaEscapes

idea:
Qbera – Managed Marketplace for Unsecured Personal Loans
Introduction: Qbera operates a consumer lending marketplace, focusing on the salaried PL product, managing both the buyer and lender side through complete ownership of the entire customer life cycle from Origination to Underwriting to Document Processing and Fulfilment, up until Loan Disbursal, which is undertaken by the respective Lending Partner (Banks or NBFCs) who also manage collections at their end
Product: Salaried Personal Loan
Ticket Size: ₹1 Lac to ₹15 Lacs (Average ₹2 Lacs) Tenure: 12 to 60 months (Average 38 Months)
Processing Fee: 2 to 4% (Average 3%)
Pricing/Interest Rate: 10.99% to 35.99% (Average 20%) – Risk Based Pricing on Portfolio
Value Proposition: Fairly priced loan, with 24-hour disbursal in the customer’s account,
through a completely paperless process
Typical Customer: Salaried Individual with ₹20-₹40K Income, staying in Shared/Rented accommodation, with CIBIL/Bureau Score of 630-700 and working in a Small or Medium sized Private Limited/LLP Company
Acquisition Strategy: Primary sourcing happens digitally (accounting for 65%) and the remaining is in a digitally managed partnership mode (through large aggregators accounting for 25% and DSAs accounting for remaining 10%)
Lending Partners: RBL Bank, IndusInd Bank and Fullerton (FICCL)
Team: Combined experience of 50+ years across Consumer and Small Business Lending, Credit Risk, Operations, Digital Marketing and Collections for Financial Products in organizations like Lehman Brothers, American Express, Citibank, GE, SBI Cards and ICICI Bank
name: Qbera

idea: YesssWorks provides coworking spaces in Mumbai and Pune. Handcrafted workspaces that act as a catalyst for your creative ideas.
name: YESSSWORKS SPACES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
BIMGRAPHIX a  BIM & Cad service provider company based in Mumbai, with representatives across the globe in UK, Australia, Malaysia, Canada & Spain. We specializing in providing BIM & Cad services to AEC industry since last 15 years.

We are specializing in :- BIM Services for Arch, Struct & MEP (LOD 100 to LOD 500), 3D BIM Coordination, Clash Detection & Resolution, As Built BIM Models, Point Cloud scan to BIM, 4D Construction Simulation, 5D BIM Model based BOQ & Costing, MEP Coordination Drawings, MEP Shop Drawings, Revit parametric Families creation, Cad Drafting Services, Paper to Cad conversions, Photo realistic Exterior & Interior Renderings, 3D Floor Plans Renderings and Architectural & Interior Animation services.
name: Bimgraphix

idea:
We are licensed architects from Council of Architecture, Delhi, India, practising all over the country with various industry leaders in Mumbai since the last 6 years. TERRAFORM ARCHITECTS was founded in the fall of 2016 and registered in the year 2019 with RoF, India. Our company speliazes in the field of Architecture, Interior Design, Master Planning, Landscape, Project Management Consultancy & Building Information Modelling services. We are also Indian Green Building Council Accredited Professionals as well as members and hence we offer green building services as well. Our office is located in the Mumbai sub- urban are of Malad West. 

Our team being thorough with various international/Indian building & design codes and by altering our design & engineering standards for every new projects, designing it from the ground up, we are able to produce & deliver elegant yet efficient Architecture. Along with the incorporations of latest green design & modern software methods such as BIM, both quality and quantity of work can be achieved in absolute time. The metamorphosis of all these disciplines will surely provide, economic & efficient output. We constantly work alongside clients, consultants & vendors to refine, improve, & simplify deliverables and execution. We also have wide network of reliable co consultants, companies, contractors, & vendors providing the necessary data, man machine, materials for smooth, swift and cost effective execution of any project.

Thank you
name: TERRAFORM ARCHITECTS

idea:
Formed by two wise crows in the wilds, Whizcrow is the brain child of Luke Taylor and Clarence Lowden. The term ‘Whizcrow’, is an amalgamation of two words, ‘Whiz’ and ‘Crow’. 

Whiz is a person who is extremely clever at something, and boy are crows clever! 

A Group of crows is called ‘Murder’, and that’s what we call our team collectively. Together we scavenge and feast on day to day problems. 
What you get at the end is a hard crow solution.
Currently our team has been scavenging a healthcare product that would revolutionise how healthcare is viewed.
name: Whizcrow Technologies Pvt. Ltd
